name: Triple Impact
description:
For the moment Triple Impact is a 3D Beat'em All where you can walk in the streets and kick asses of random blue guys who attack you for no reason and you can switch between 3 characters and level up.

In the future updates each character will have it's own abilities and their will be different enemies and bosses and the time will be passing (like in Shenmue) and you will have the possibility to play different activities and a lot of other things.

Controls (Xbox/Playstation) :
- X/◻ : Light attack
- Y/△ : Heavy attack
- A/x : Run outside combat and dodge during combat
- Start : Pause and skip intro
- Select : Switch the map display (Mini map, full map, both hidden)
